Key Match Events: West Indies defeated Sri Lanka by five wickets to take 1-0 led in the three-match series on Sunday.
Brandon King and Evin Lewis hit half-centuries.
Rovman Powell won the toss and opted to bowl first against Sri Lanka in the series opener.
Others: Charith Asalanka said he would have bowled first as well.
Playing XIs for both teams were provided.
Full squads for both teams were provided.
